casebody.data:
HAMLET H.M.A., LLC
v.
HERNANDEZ 425A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 29, 2019 Mark L. Hayes, Attorney at Law, for Hernandez, Pedro (M.D.) William S. F. Freeman, Attorney at Law, Rebecca C. Huntington, Attorney at Law, for Hamlet H.M.A., LLC D/B/A Sandhills Regional Medical Center

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 28th of March 2019 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of March 2019."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 5th day of April 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
